data.text: Fantastic staff. Want to thank Roberto extra for making our stay unforgettable! Great location - close to everything but still in a quiet area. Good, spacious rooms with everything you need. Cleaning every day. Small but cute rooftop pool area. If I come back to Barcelona I will choose Catalonia Gracia again!!!
data.title: Fantastic hotel in central Barcelona

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hello,

Thank you very much for your great and detailed review. We allways do our best to provide our guests the best stay. It was a pleasure to receive you in our hotel. Hope to see you again and soon in Barcelona.

best regards,

catalonia Gracia Staff
owner_response.author: lapedrera lapedrera

data.text:
The room we rented is right next to a building undergoing renovation with extremely loud banging on the walls from very early morning and going on late into the evening. The hotel should not have rented this room out. We were not warned, not offered any ear plugs, a change of room or any compensation. The hotel simply claimed its not their responsibility.

The bathroom also had a strange smell and although the plug was changed on the bath it still began to drain out water before you were ready.

Do not use this hotel the management do not care about its guests
data.title: Beware next door renovation works! Management does not care about its guests.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear  danny_hay25,
We appreciate your comments.
We regret all the incidents you tell us about, and the inconvenience. Due to the works, the hotel does not know when they are going to do work on an adjacent building, otherwise we would have told them something.
In any case, the hotel could have acted if he had told us about it at check out, not when he had already left.
Best regards,
owner_response.author: lapedrera lapedrera

data.text: We spent a long weekend at the hotel with friends. The rooms were rather small, but the equipment was adequate. The location of the hotel was satisfactory, city transport within walking distance. we did not use the catering. The price/quality ratio was fine.
data.title: Nice stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hello,

Thank you for your review. Hope to see you next time in Barcelona.

Best Regards,

Catalonia Gracia
owner_response.author: lapedrera lapedrera

data.text: Great value for the price. The location is perfect (close to Gracia, close to Psg d Gracia too) Beds are very comfortable, room was spacious. Staff very nice too. Only the water was running out of bathtub bit slowly but you can live with that:)
data.title: I would stay here again

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear petra_O2181XR,

We thank you for your positive comments about our hotel. It helps us to keep working and try to improve every day. It's a great satisfaction to know that we have meet your expectations during your stay with us and look forward to welcoming you back.
Best regards,

HC Gracia
owner_response.author: lapedrera lapedrera

data.text: Hotel Gracia is located in a great part of town-close to shops and restaurants. I had not been to Barcelona before, and my Spanish is quite rusty, but the staff were kind, patient, and helpful. The hotel is clean, comfortable, and modern. I will definitely stay there the next time I visit!
data.title: Lovely Stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear seattle_TRAVELER4444,
We appreciate your stay with us and your time valuing it.
Thank you so much for sharing this 10/10 review! We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your accommodation and our staff was attentive to your needs.
We hope to welcome you on future occasions.
Kind regards,
HC GracIA
owner_response.author: lapedrera lapedrera
